question: bank transfer times aml compliance steps

ground_truth_answer: Bank transfer times vary from up to 7 days for high street banks to 1-3 days using specialist brokers. For compliance with Anti-Money Laundering (AML) rules, businesses must develop and implement an effective AML program with written policies, a designated compliance officer, independent review, and staff training. They must also file Suspicious Activity Reports for transactions over $2,000 that appear suspicious and conduct thorough customer due diligence.
